messages.message: Search Feature Feedback: The ability to stop a search when you can see it took a wrong interpretation, rather then to have to wait for it to write it all out as a response

Heard a lot of feedback wanting this for chat too - [DR-4138] Stop query execution once in progress. Once stopped, you can edit message and rerun. - Jira (atlassian.net (http://atlassian.net)) (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/DR-4138)
Sadly not prioritised yet :disappointed: But we'll look into it as more feedback comes in
@Mitch Welzen - I’m curious how you identified that the interpretation was wrong. Can you share the specific example, if possible?

I unfortunately deleted the queries, but I though it would pass down some context on my initial query.

Then asked, "Take your time to dig deeper into this topic and find all relevant information"

This returned information not related to the query above and was generic, not on a specific topic @Varun Jain
Got it. Were you using the multi-step model for these queries?
I think it was defaulted to Multui-step lite
Got it, that’s interesting. We expect less of such behavior with multi-step lite pipeline @Hari @Sławek Biel
